languages.text: "Коль отныне быть мне твоей тенью, Домин'{name}, нам должно свершить ритуал, что скрепит эти узы, угодные Неумирающему. Поговори со мной на мостике, и я отведу нас в подходящее для обряда место".
languages.translation_comment: Этот куй переводит игрока в ивент RitualEvent_dialogue

traits.locale_text: "Коль отныне быть мне твоей тенью, Домин'{name}, нам должно свершить ритуал, что скрепит эти узы, угодные Неумирающему. Поговори со мной на мостике, и я отведу нас в подходящее для обряда место".

languages.translation_comment: Этот куй переводит игрока в ивент RitualEvent_dialogue

languages.text: "As I am now fated to be your shadow, Domin'{name}, we must perform a ritual that will seal our bond, for it pleases the Undying One. Let us speak on the bridge, and I will take us to a place appropriate for the ritual."
languages.original_text: "Коль отныне быть мне твоей тенью, Домин'{name}, нам должно свершить ритуал, что скрепит эти узы, угодные Неумирающему. Поговори со мной на мостике, и я отведу нас в подходящее для обряда место".

traits.locale_text: "As I am now fated to be your shadow, Domin'{name}, we must perform a ritual that will seal our bond, for it pleases the Undying One. Let us speak on the bridge, and I will take us to a place appropriate for the ritual."

"As I am now fated to be your shadow, Domin'{name}, we must perform a ritual that will seal our bond, for it pleases the Undying One. Let us speak on the bridge, and I will take us to a place appropriate for the ritual."

"As I am now fated to be your shadow, Domin'{name}, we must perform a ritual that will seal our bond, for it pleases the Undying One. Let us speak on the bridge, and I will take us to a place appropriate for the ritual."

"As I am now fated to be your shadow, Domin'{name}, we must perform a ritual that will seal our bond, for it pleases the Undying One. I shall await you on the deck where your officers carry out their service."

"As I am now fated to be your shadow, Domin'{name}, we must perform a ritual that will seal our bond, for it pleases the Undying One. Let us speak on the bridge, and I will take us to a place appropriate for the ritual."

"As I am now fated to be your shadow, Domin'{name}, we must perform a ritual that will seal our bond, for it pleases the Undying One. I will await you on the deck where your officers carry out their service."

"As I am now fated to be your shadow, Domin'{name}, we must perform a ritual that will seal our bond, for it pleases the Undying One. Let us speak on the bridge, and I will take us to a place appropriate for the ritual."

"As I am now fated to be your shadow, Domin'{name}, we must perform a ritual that will seal our bond, for it pleases the Undying One. Let us speak on the bridge, and I will take us to a place appropriate for the ritual."

languages.text: «Puesto que ahora estoy destinada a ser su sombra, Domin'{name}, debemos realizar un ritual para sellar nuestro vínculo, pues eso complace al Inmortal. L{mf|e|a} esperaré en la cubierta en la que sus oficiales desempeñan sus funciones».
languages.original_text: "As I am now fated to be your shadow, Domin'{name}, we must perform a ritual that will seal our bond, for it pleases the Undying One. I will await you on the deck where your officers carry out their service."

traits.locale_text: «Puesto que ahora estoy destinada a ser su sombra, Domin'{name}, debemos realizar un ritual para sellar nuestro vínculo, pues eso complace al Inmortal. L{mf|e|a} esperaré en la cubierta en la que sus oficiales desempeñan sus funciones».

languages.text: 「ドミン{name}、私は君の影となる運命です。我々の絆を封印する儀式を執り行りましょう。不死の者がお望みですから。士官たちが執務を行う甲板でお待ちしています」
languages.original_text: "As I am now fated to be your shadow, Domin'{name}, we must perform a ritual that will seal our bond, for it pleases the Undying One. I will await you on the deck where your officers carry out their service."

traits.locale_text: 「ドミン{name}、私は君の影となる運命です。我々の絆を封印する儀式を執り行りましょう。不死の者がお望みですから。士官たちが執務を行う甲板でお待ちしています」

languages.text: “既然我已经是你的影子了，秘者{name}，那我们必须举行一场仪式，巩固我们的关系，取悦不死之神。我会在军官执行任务的甲板上等你。”
languages.original_text: "As I am now fated to be your shadow, Domin'{name}, we must perform a ritual that will seal our bond, for it pleases the Undying One. I will await you on the deck where your officers carry out their service."

traits.locale_text: “既然我已经是你的影子了，秘者{name}，那我们必须举行一场仪式，巩固我们的关系，取悦不死之神。我会在军官执行任务的甲板上等你。”

languages.text: "Da es nun mein Schicksal ist, Euer Schatten zu sein, Domin'{name}, müssen wir ein Ritual durchführen, das unser Band besiegelt, denn so will es der Todlose. Ich erwarte Euch auf dem Deck, wo Eure Offiziere ihren Dienst erfüllen."
languages.original_text: "As I am now fated to be your shadow, Domin'{name}, we must perform a ritual that will seal our bond, for it pleases the Undying One. I will await you on the deck where your officers carry out their service."

traits.locale_text: "Da es nun mein Schicksal ist, Euer Schatten zu sein, Domin'{name}, müssen wir ein Ritual durchführen, das unser Band besiegelt, denn so will es der Todlose. Ich erwarte Euch auf dem Deck, wo Eure Offiziere ihren Dienst erfüllen."

languages.text: « Puisque je suis désormais appelée à devenir votre ombre, Domin'{name}, l'Immortel veut que nous accomplissions un rituel propre à sceller notre lien. Je vous attendrai sur la passerelle où opèrent vos officiers. »
languages.original_text: "As I am now fated to be your shadow, Domin'{name}, we must perform a ritual that will seal our bond, for it pleases the Undying One. I will await you on the deck where your officers carry out their service."

traits.locale_text: « Puisque je suis désormais appelée à devenir votre ombre, Domin'{name}, l'Immortel veut que nous accomplissions un rituel propre à sceller notre lien. Je vous attendrai sur la passerelle où opèrent vos officiers. »
